text: Violent Saturday is a 1955 American crime movie. It was directed by Richard Fleischer. The movie is based on the book by William Heath. Actors include Victor Mature, Richard Egan, Stephen McNally, Virginia Leith, Lee Marvin, Sylvia Sidney, and Ernest Borgnine. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1955 crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Fleischer
title: Violent Saturday
